quotes.sentence: We are only human, and the gods have fashioned us for love. That is our great glory, and our great tragedy.
Burn them all!
Fear cuts deeper than swords.
When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.
Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.
Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.
A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused.
Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder.
I have always found revenge to be the purest of motivations.
It doesn't matter what we want. Once we get it, then we want something else.
The fall breaks them. And some are given a chance to climb; they cling to the real or the gods or love.
Can a man still be brave if he's afraid? That is the only time a man can be brave.
We don't have time for all this. The Night King has your dragon. He's one of them now. The Wall has fallen. The dead march south.
All I ever wanted was to fight for a lord I believed in. But the good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.
All my life men like you have sneered at me, and all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.
I will shield your back and keep your counsel, and give my life for yours if need be.
All this horror that has come to my family, it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.
Laughter is poison to fear.
I don't care about checking my worst impulses. I don't care about making the world a better place. Hang the world.
I don't choose sides. I'm the queen of the Seven Kingdoms.
I want our baby to live. Don't let me die, Jaime. Please don't let me die.
If you ever call me sister again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep.
If you want a whore, buy one. If you want a Queen, earn her.
Power, is power
Tears aren't a woman's only weapon. The best one's between your legs.
The more people you love, the weaker you are.
The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy.
The only way to keep your people loyal is to make certain they fear you more than they do the enemy.
When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
You love your children. It's why you'll never win.
You understood fear once long ago, but you've forgotten what it means. Someone who's forgotten fear, has forgotten how to hide.
All men must die, but we are not men.
Dracarys!
He was no dragon. Fire cannot kill a dragon.
I am Daenerys Stormborn of the Blood of old Valyria and I will take what is mine, with fire and blood I will take it
I am the dragon's daughter, and I swear to you that those who would harm you will die screaming.
Which war was won without deceit and mass murder?
I may not know the north, but I know men. They're more or less the same in any corner of the world and even the bravest of them don't want to see their wives and children skinned for a lost cause.
Hold the door.
By what right does the wolf judge the lion?
Fighting bravely for a losing cause is admirable. Fighting for a winning cause is far more rewarding.
The things I do for love.
There are no men like me. Only me.
Three victories don't make you a conqueror.
If the day comes when you must find me again, just give that coin to any man from Braavos and say these words to him: "Valar morghulis."
You want to lead one day? Then learn how to follow
Everyone is mine to torment.
Say what you will about the Targaryens, they were conquerors.
Everything before the word "but" is horseshit.
If I fall, don't bring me back.
I swore a vow to the Night's Watch. If I don't take my own word seriously, what sort of "Lord of Winterfell" would I be?
Love is the death of duty.
There is only one war that matters. The Great War. And it is here.
The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.
Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.
The North remembers! We know no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark.
The freedom to make my own mistakes was all I ever wanted.
The night is dark and full of terrors.
A madman sees what he sees.
A ruler who hides behind paid executioners soon forgets what death is.
I, Eddard of the house Stark, lord of Winterfell and warden of the North, sentence you to die.
I grew up with soldiers. I learned how to die a long time ago.
The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.
Winter is coming!
When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives
Tell your father I'm here. And tell him the Lannisters aren't the only ones who pay their debts.
'Tis a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don't want to be most of us.
You're not a golden lion. You're just a pink little man, who is far too slow on the draw.
I was told you were drunk, impertinent and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper.
The world is overflowing with horrible things, but theyâ€™re all a tray of cakes next to death.
You're a dragon. Be a dragon.
But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.
If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.
I'm the King, I get what I want. I never loved my brothers. Sad thing for a man to admit, but it's true. You were the brother I chose.
All men should keep their word, kings most of all.
I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no reason to be afraid.
Whilst Lord Janos was hiding with the women and children, Jon Snow was leading.
Yes, well I suppose life is irregular
I am a Stark of Winterfell, this is my home. And you can't frighten me.
I hate the king more than any of them.
Only a fool would trust Littlefinger.
No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.
When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies, but the pack survives.
It's better to be cruel than weak.
It's always seemed there was an impossible choice I had to make...Stark or Greyjoy.
My sword is yours, in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.
Gingers are beautiful. We've been kissed by fire.
A Lannister always pays his debts.
A ruler who kills those devoted to her is not a ruler who inspires devotion.
Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height.
Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities.
I'm a constant disappointment to my own father, and I have learned to live with it.
I'm guilty of being a dwarf.
I am your son. I have always been your son.
I did not kill Joffrey, but I wish that I had! Watching your vicious bastard die gave me more relief than a thousand lying whores!
I have a lot of experience in losing.
I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.
I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.
I wish I was the monster you think I am! I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you! I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it!
It's hard to put a leash on a dog once you've put a crown on its head.
It's not easy being drunk all the time. Everyone would do it, if it were easy.
Love is more powerful than reason. We all know that.
Many underestimated you. Most of them are dead now.
Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour, and it can never be used to hurt you.
No matter who you are, no matter how strong you are, sooner or later, you'll face circumstances beyond your control.
People often claim to hunger for truth, but seldom like the taste when it's served up.
That bit of theatre will haunt our family for a generation.
That's what I do: I drink and I know things.
The day will come when you think you are safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.
Well, my brother has his sword, and I have my mind, and a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone, if it's to keep its edge.
When you tear out a man's tongue, you are not proving him a liar, you're only telling the world that you fear what he might say
Why is it that when one man builds a wall, the next man immediately needs to know what's on the other side?
You love your children. It's your one redeeming quality. That and your cheekbones.
A lion does not concern himself with the opinion of sheep.
Any man who must say 'I am the King' is no true King.
Every day that he remains a prisoner, the less our name commands respect.
He's a Lannister! Maybe the lowest of the Lannisters, but he's one of us. And everyday that he remains a prisoner, the less our name commands respect.
I need you to become the man you were always meant to be. Not next year, not tomorrow, now.
If another house can seize one of our own and hold him captive with impunity, we are no longer a house to be feared.
You are being counseled at this very moment.
A hound will die for you, but never lie to you.
Aye, there's a reason. I'm a big fucker and I'm tough to kill.
Fuck the king.
Hate's as good a thing as any to keep a person going. Better than most. We come across my brother, maybe we can both cross a name off our list.
How did a mad fucker like you live this long?
If you can't protect yourself, die and get out of the way of those who can. Sharp steel and strong arms rule this world, don't ever believe any different.

Thoros isn't here anymore, so I hope you're not about to give a sermon. Because if you are, the Lord of Light's gonna wonder why he brought you back 19 times just to watch you die when I chuck you over this fucking wall.
You're shit at dying you know that?.
Your lips are moving and you're complaining about something. That's whinging. This one's been killed six times. (points to Beric) You don't hear him bitching about it.
The storms come and go, the big fish eat the little fish and I keep on paddling.
Power resides where men believe it resides. It's a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.
The Freys and the Lannisters send their regards.
Every man must die, Jon Snow. but first, he must live
You know nothing, Jon Snow.
